001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.dao;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import androidx.room.Dao;
005import androidx.room.Insert;
006import androidx.room.Query;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.entity.User;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Maybe;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010
011@Dao
012public interface UserDao {
013
014  String USER_QUERY = "SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id = :userId";
015  String USER_OATH_QUERY = "SELECT * FROM user WHERE oauth_key = :oauthKey";
016  @Insert
017  Single<Long> insert(User user);
018
019  @Query(USER_QUERY)
020  LiveData<User> select(long userId);
021
022  @Query(USER_OATH_QUERY)
023  Maybe<User> select(String oauthKey);
024
025}
